column2: Nintendo Create a new Ganon clone and DE-CLONE Captain Falcon in Smash Bros. 4,open"
column4: Smash brothers and F-Zero fans around the world were disappointed and heartbroken the day they found out Captain Falcon was a Ganon clone in Smash Bros. Melee. This was an outrage and was completely unacceptable. The fact that this has been accepted over time is very upsetting,,,Create a new Ganon clone and DE-CLONE Captain Falcon in Smash Bros. 4
